review: Best Place to eat a very tasty pizza and kind staff. Served me very kindly and they are very polite. Took a great care until I finish the food. Tasty pizza. Just pay visit and see it yourself.
Fancied a pizza after eating typical Sri Lankan food for over a week. The pizza here was well made, nice crusty base and the service was good.
Welcome addition to area. Food if fantastic and service is second to non. Great service and nice atmosphere. Really good pizza

Plenty of walking around Galle since 8 am and seeing the sights meant I was hot and sweaty and needed a beer around midday....

My first choice was The Lighthouse Hotel for my 2 nights in Galle but they were fully booked and I was...aware one had awesome views of the Indian Ocean from here. Hence decided to visit and have a beer - the main bar only opens at 3 pm so had to make do with The Anchor Bar which is Poolside.

A chill bottle of Lion Lager and a chat with the friendly bartender.....

The staff is attentive and friendly, ensuring that guests feel well taken care of throughout their meal. The...menu features a variety of dishes, each expertly prepared and bursting with flavor. From appetizers to desserts, every dish is a culinary delight, showcasing the chef's skill and dedication to quality. Whether you're looking for a casual meal or a special dining experience, Calle Mango House is sure to impress with its top-notch service and delicious cuisi menu features a variety of dishes, each expertly prepared and bursting with flavor. From appetizers to desserts, every dish is a culinary delight, showcasing the chef's skill and dedication to quality. Whether you're looking for a casual meal or a special dining experience, Calle Mango House is sure to impress with its top-notch service and delicious cuisine.

Truly delicious food, cold beer, great service. A beautiful little pocket with shade and colourful umbrellas. Would have happily stayed all afternoon.

Restaurant (linked to Mango House Boutique Hotel) with a cozy garden equipped with  lamps in colorful umbrellas.
Even if the Garden is next to the road it's quiet and also the background music is not too loud.

This is a lovely hotel with a great restaurant. The staff are so helpful and Pradeep makes a top class cocktail!
Galle Fort is an historic place and Mango House is fully in keeping with the historical background of the place. Definitely recommend the hotel,...restaurant and bar/cocktai restaurant and bar/cocktails.

Excellent meal in a nice atmosphere with very friendly and attentive service. I had an octopus black curry with roti which was very delicious. The sauce was amazing- spicy, but not too spicy. The quality and presentation of the food was superb.
This is the great place in Galle fort. Never feel as out of home. Dedicated staff , delicious food, back up music, ancient atmosphere ...highly recommend
Its a delicious dinner with my friends. Excellent combination of foods. Lovely presentation. The Galle best. Love to be with my family. Everyone go check.
Beautiful outside dining area. Wonderful staff, especially Shiva who was very attentive. Food was gorgeous and a couple of not too shabby margaritas.
Abstthr best place to eat in the Fort. Gorgeous food and romantic setting with good quality fresh white wines and very good Red Snapper.
Great atmosphere and food in the heart of Galle Fort. Not the cheapest but I would highly recommend to enjoy dinner here. üëå
